function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Weak acceptance of cooler conditions in the northern group","Impact":"Decreased thermal satisfaction and potential spread of contagious diseases due to crowded and uncomfortable conditions","Mitigation":"Implementation of temperature control measures, education on personal protective measures, and indoor air quality monitoring","Technologies":"Temperature monitoring and control systems, air purification systems, and education and awareness campaigns","People":"Occupants in the northern group, especially those in crowded spaces","Owner":"Building management, health authorities, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Overcooling problem in buildings in northern China","Impact":"Dramatic decrease in occupant satisfaction, potential energy waste, and increased risk of cold-related health issues","Mitigation":"Implementation of temperature control policies, building insulation improvements, and energy-efficient HVAC systems","Technologies":"Smart thermostat systems, building insulation materials, and energy-efficient HVAC solutions","People":"Occupants in buildings in northern China, energy management authorities","Owner":"Building management, energy management authorities"}]}
